overview:
Matt is the Lead Developer (and Co-Founder) at Aduity, a mobile advertising start-up based in South Africa. He spends most of his time handling all the technical issues at Aduity, leading the development team and coding up a storm!

When it comes to web and mobile technologies, Matt has in-depth knowledge coupled with experience and skill that makes him an invaluable asset to the team at Aduity.

He also enjoys playing around with new technologies, a curious developer at heart. Matt uses small side projects to learn, understand and test newer technologies before implementing them at Aduity. He also enjoys sharing some of this development knowledge on his blog (mattgeri.com).

When he is not working, Matt enjoys watching sport, the outdoors (a fellow Land Rover enthusiast) and on occasion blogging.
